Loaded Dice.name: Loaded Dice
Loaded Dice.blurb: Upon killing a unit, Twisted Fate rolls his 'lucky' dice receiving anywhere between 1 and 6 bonus gold.
Loaded Dice.description: Innate: Twisted Fate rolls his dice every time he kills an enemy, randomly gaining 1 − 6 (based on probability).
Loaded Dice.notes: * Total average of gold gained is  4.

Wild Cards.name: Wild Cards
Wild Cards.blurb: Twisted Fate throws three cards, dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through.
Wild Cards.description: Active: Twisted Fate throws three cards in a cone, dealing  magic damage to all enemies they pass through.
Wild Cards.description2: Enemies can only be damaged once by Wild Cards.

Pick a Card.name: Pick a Card
Pick a Card.blurb: Twisted Fate chooses a magic card from his deck, and uses that for his next attack, causing bonus effects.
Pick a Card.description: First Cast - Pick a Card: Twisted Fate cycles through  three cards for 6 seconds. Choosing one by reactivating Pick a Card converts Twisted Fate's next basic attack within 6 seconds to instead deal magic damage and a bonus effect based on the card selected. The basic attack applies on-hit and spell effects but cannot  critical strike.
Pick a Card.description2: Second Cast -  Blue Card: Restores  mana.
Pick a Card.description3: Second Cast -  Red Card: Deals magic damage around the target and  slows all enemies hit for 2.5 seconds.
Pick a Card.description4: Second Cast -  Gold Card:  Stuns the target.
Pick a Card.notes:
* Pick a Card will stack and can trigger  Stacked Deck.
 The first card shown on-first-cast is random but the order always remains the same ( Blue Card,  Red Card,  Gold Card, repeat).
 Twisted Fate can choose a card in  stasis.

Stacked Deck.name: Stacked Deck
Stacked Deck.blurb: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals bonus damage. In addition, his Attack Speed is increased.
Stacked Deck.description: Passive: Twisted Fate gains  bonus attack speed.
Stacked Deck.description2: Passive: Twisted Fate gains a Stacked Deck stack for every basic attack on-hit, up to a maximum of three.
Stacked Deck.description3: At 3 stacks, his next basic attack against  non-structures consumes the stacks on-attack to deal bonus magic damage.
Stacked Deck.notes: * Stacked Deck can be  dodged or negated if Twisted Fate is  blinded (the enhanced attack is not consumed in either case) but can only be mitigated if  blocked (the enhanced attack is consumed but the bonus damage is still applied).

Destiny.name: Destiny
Destiny.blurb: Twisted Fate predicts the fortunes of his foes, revealing all enemy champions and enabling the use of Gate, which teleports Twisted Fate to any target location in 1.5 seconds.
Destiny.description: First Cast - Destiny: Twisted Fate and his allies gain  true sight of all  enemy champions for a few seconds. After a 0.5 second delay, Twisted Fate can use  Gate once for the duration.
Destiny.description2: Second Cast - Gate: Twisted Fate channels for 1.5 seconds,  blinking to the target location upon completion.
Destiny.notes:
* Destiny will reveal  wards and  stealthed traps if they are within  sight range of a revealed enemy champion.
 Gate will be interrupted if Twisted Fate enters  stasis ( Zhonya's Hourglass,  Tempered Fate) while channeling.
  Paranoia will prevent Destiny's  true sight regardless of which one was cast first (enemy champions can still be revealed by Destiny after Paranoia ends if durations permit).
 Gate will destroy any  projectiles targeting Twisted Fate when the channel ends.
